00010 void
00011 tokenize(const string & s1, list<string> & lt)
00012 {
00013   lt.clear();
00014     
00015   string s(s1);
00016   
00017   if (s[0] == '"') s.replace(0, 1, "`` ");
00018   replace(s, " \"", "  `` ");
00019   replace(s, "(\"", "( `` ");
00020   replace(s, "[\"", "[ `` ");
00021   replace(s, "{\"", "{ `` ");
00022   replace(s, "<\"", "< `` ");
00023 
00024   replace(s, "...", " ... ");
00025 
00026   replace(s, ",", " , ");
00027   replace(s, ";", " ; ");
00028   replace(s, ":", " : ");
00029   replace(s, "@", " @ ");
00030   replace(s, "#", " # ");
00031   replace(s, "$", " $ ");
00032   replace(s, "%", " % ");
00033   replace(s, "&", " & ");
00034 
00035   int pos = s.size() - 1;
00036   while (pos > 0 && s[pos] == ' ') pos--;
00037   while (pos > 0) {
00038     char c = s[pos];
00039     if (c == '[' || c == ']' || c == ')' || c == '}' || c == '>' ||
00040         c == '"' || c == '\'') {
00041       pos--; continue;
00042     }
00043     break;
00044   }
00045   if (s[pos] == '.' && !(pos > 0 && s[pos-1] == '.')) s.replace(pos, 1, " .");
00046   
00047   replace(s, "?", " ? ");
00048   replace(s, "!", " ! ");
00049     
00050   replace(s, "[", " [ ");
00051   replace(s, "]", " ] ");
00052   replace(s, "(", " ( ");
00053   replace(s, ")", " ) ");
00054   replace(s, "{", " { ");
00055   replace(s, "}", " } ");
00056   replace(s, "<", " < ");
00057   replace(s, ">", " > ");
00058 
00059   replace(s, "--", " -- ");
00060 
00061   s.replace(string::size_type(0), 0, " ");
00062   s.replace(s.size(), 0, " ");
00063   
00064   replace(s, "\"", " '' ");
00065 
00066   replace(s, "' ", " ' ", '\'');
00067   replace(s, "'s ", " 's ");
00068   replace(s, "'S ", " 'S ");
00069   replace(s, "'m ", " 'm ");
00070   replace(s, "'M ", " 'M ");

00099   replace(s, "'twas ", " 't was ");

00103   istringstream is(s);
00104   string t;

00106     lt.push_back(t);

00110 
00111 static void
00112 replace(string & s, const string & s1, const string & s2, const char skip)
00113 {
00114   string::size_type pos = 0;
00115   while (1) {
00116     string::size_type i = s.find(s1, pos);
00117     if (i == string::npos) break;
00118     if (i > 0 && s[i-1] == skip) {
00119       pos = i + 1;
00120       continue;
00121     }
00122     s.replace(i, s1.size(), s2);
00123     pos = i + s2.size();
00124   }
00125 
00126 }
